Name: Berlin Sour
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered lemon slice wheel and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry sail. (Skewer through either side of lemon with cherry skewered in the centre.)
Garnish with skewered lemon slice wheel and maraschino cherry (sail).
Review: The sweet powerful flavours of kummel and maraschino liqueurs are tamed and harnessed in this sour.
History: Created in 2009 by Thorsten Pannek at Hilton, Frankfurt, Germany.
Nutrition: One serving of Berlin Sour contains 234 calories
